title: ISic000557. I.Sicily inscription 000557
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) m(anibus)
M(arcus) ((·)) Aurelius
Ermeros ((·)) M(arco) ((·)) A(urelio)
Callinico ((·)) pa-
5trono ((·)) opti-
mo ((·)) b(ene) ((·)) m(erenti) ((·)) f(ecit)

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

To the spirits of the dead. Marcus Aurelius Ermeros made this for Marcus Aurelius Callinicus, most excellent and well-deserving patron.

Italian translation

Agli spiriti dei defunti. Marcus Aurelius Ermeros fece questo per Marcus Aurelius Callinicus, ottimo e meritevole patrono.

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7303 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
